channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Police have made two further arrests, counter-terrorism Policing Assistant Commissioner Laurence Taylor confirmed. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #News #BBCNews

item.title: Police also said the deadly attack on the synagogue in Manchester has been declared a terrorist incident. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #News #BBCNews

item.title: Four people remain in hospital following a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester, Greater Manchester Police Chief Constable Sir Stephen Watson has confirmed. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #New
